metadata.title: CVE-2020-15572 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: Tor before 0.4.3.6 has an out-of-bounds memory access that allows a remotedenial-of-service (crash) attack against Tor instances built to use MozillaNetwork Security Services (NSS), aka TROVE-2020-001.

criterions.comment: tor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
